content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the stone furnace entity used for smelting operations (primarily converting iron ore into iron plates). It accepts coal as fuel and iron ore as input, with a recorded fuel reserve (e.g. {'coal': 6}). The furnace is part of the smelting setup designed to produce iron plates and has been the central structure in attempts to process inputs despite multiple smelting timeouts.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• Crafting prerequisite errors
  - When crafting items, always verify that all required raw resources have been gathered. In this case, attempting to craft a stone furnace before obtaining sufficient stone led to a crafting failure. Ensure raw resources are available before initiating a craft process.

• Smelting operation timeouts
  - Persistent smelting timeout errors indicate insufficient or imbalanced fuel and input supply. Before initiating smelting or inserting additional inputs, confirm that the furnace has adequate fuel and proper quantities of inputs to initiate a complete smelting cycle.

• Extraction operations with inadequate available output
  - Extraction errors occur when attempting to extract items from a furnace with zero available output. Ensure that the furnace output is above zero before extraction to avoid attempting to extract non-existent items.
